<a id="VSlider"></a>

# VSlider

**Inherits:** [Slider](Slider.md) **\<** [Range](Range.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A vertical slider that goes from bottom (min) to top (max).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A vertical slider, used to adjust a value by moving a grabber along a vertical axis. It is a [Range](Range.md)-based control and goes from bottom (min) to top (max). Note that this direction is the opposite of [VScrollBar](VScrollBar.md)'s.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
